review: * **** *** *** *** **** **** ** ***** ***** ********* ** ***** she understood everything very well to me. shy explained  everything clearly i am suffering from ovarian cyst and endometriosis problem since 2019 I have visited appolo cardle, safdarjung, aaims, bansal and may more doctors in delhi but one like her she started my treatment and now I am very positive about her. I hope I started my wife's treatment from here then results will be something else.  The rating was given by mistake..üôèüôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
She is a amazing doctor. I visited her for my wife . She was having abdominal on and off Pain issue for very long. I took her to many doctors before but got no relief. Then came to know Dr. Hamra. She was spot on with diagnosis and prescribed some tests and medication and my wife was better in 5 days. 
The doctor is kind and generous. I recommend her strongly. May God bless her so that she can bless all her patients with her skills.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My wife and me visited the doctor for normal checkup during 1st month of pregnancy. though waiting time was almost 1 hour and poor reception facilities, finally got a chance to meet the doctor, she is very genuine, warm, friendly and motherly like lady. my wife was very nervous but the moment she entered in the doctor room she got relax because the way doctor greeted us and was able to discuss everything she was experiencing,  she listened very carefully and advised some exercise and diet plan and some test which happen at the same time . I would strongly recommend the doctor.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: My mother went to her for her treatment.. As she was in such a pain and can't handle the immense pain. So when she went for the checkup to Dr. Hamrah Siddiqui in voila hospital, firstly she waited them for such a long time and checked her reports then she suggested to do the treatment as my mother went for a treatment in an non Ac ward and she came back at the same day but after the treatment she was in sooo much pain after one week of treatment she start getting pain again she went to do the checkup again but she went and without doing any checkup nurse gave her injection,  still then also she didn't came to check and then after the checkup after my mother suffered so much she said , she has to do the treatment again.. And when we get test again.* ** *** ***** ********* **** *** ***** **** *** ** ** ******* ***  **** *********** Such a bad experience with her I can't explain. As a doctor she should see this.
booked am appointment for my pregnent wife Doctor don't see altrasound report and prescription of other doctor not guiding me properly she was rude on call
*** ** * **** ****** *** very genuine. Instead of Frightening me for my pregnancy issues she just responded so politely and easy going.
